facts: Apple internal components observed: duetexpertd, triald, JetsamEvent, Backboardd, Suggestions.
Bug types around 6/11 included 202, 288, 309 in scanned materials.
MyViettel communications used GlobalSign-backed certificate (legitimate OV chain).
Microsoft-related strings (AAD, Defender) present in consolidated inputs.
No same-second/±60s/±5m cross-device temporal clusters found in this session.
Apple Support CSV produced no ±5m matches with the available event timestamps.
hypotheses: CoreDuet/UI over-activity may indicate heightened behavioral collection; not proof of compromise.
Potential state-level misuse of external infrastructures (e.g., Microsoft) is suggestive, not conclusive.
Kabuki (Pegasus-evolved) may coordinate multi-device observation; insufficient evidence for confirmation.
